title: Poster, "A Nation of Nations, The National Museum of History and Technology, Smithsonian Institution", 1976
medium: Offset lithography on white wove paper
inscribed:
Printed in red, lower left: The National Museum of History and Technology   The Smithsonian Institution, Washington, D.C.
Printed in brown, lower left along edge: Design: Chermayeff & Geismar Associates
description: Against a white field, an explosive assembly of small square brown and white photographic portraits of famous men and women.  The design is dense at the left center. Toward the edges of the cluster, the images are placed independently against the white background.  In bold red letters at lower right,  A Nation / of Nations.

tombstone.epitaph: Poster, "A Nation of Nations, The National Museum of History and Technology, Smithsonian Institution", 1976.Offset lithography on white wove paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-245.
